job_tasks.phrase: Review Requirement documentation and technical specifications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand and process requirements and specifications, which are key inputs for understanding the business context and translating needs into technical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, Code & Unit test product features
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of core software development activities: designing, writing code, and performing unit testing.

job_tasks.phrase: Defect resolution, working with QA team on resolution of issues
job_tasks.justification: Working with QA to resolve defects is an integral part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring the quality and functionality of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide input into planning and status tracking
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to planning and status tracking requires understanding project goals and progress, linking technical work to business objectives.
Build automation is a software development practice that streamlines the process of creating, testing, and deploying software.

soft_skills.phrase: working with QA teams on resolution of defects
Provide input into planning and status tracking
Wide range of IBM trainings and certificates
Unlimited access to Udemy, Harvard Business Review, Safari O'Reilly, getAbstract, IBM AI Skills Academy

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks like coding, unit testing, defect resolution, and build automation. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, fine-tuning, or any specific GenAI technologies, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
